title: The One Where Lala Goes To BravoCon
description:
Lala went to BravoCon and took her mom, Lisa, and her brother, Easton, with her! Was there drama? Yes! Was there fun?! Lots of it! And did Lala or Easton have to give up their respective rooms to mom, Lisa? Not once! They spill some tea on Jen Shah, Jennifer Aydin, Lisa Rinna, Vicki Gunvalson, Brandi Glanville, Sofia With An F, and the Toms!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
